text:
[Verse]
Waves crashing on the sand
Golden light touches land
Morning sky opens wide
Feel the warmth deep inside

[Verse 2]
Seagulls screech
They fly high
Colors blend in the sky
Footprints trail in the mud
Tides rush in like a flood

[Chorus]
Sunrise on the shore
Heart feels free once more
Every day a new start
Healing every scar

[Verse 3]
Salty air
Ocean breeze
Whispers through the palm trees
Dancing shadows on the dunes
Softly hums a sailor's tune

[Verse 4]
Shells scatter on the beach
Dreams just within reach
Sandcastles standing tall
Waiting for the nightfall

[Chorus]
Sunrise on the shore
Heart feels free once more
Every day a new start
Healing every scar
title: Sunrise On the Shore
